HISTORY OF LIVERPOOL

Liverpool is a club that was founded 1892, Anfield, Liverpool, United Kingdom.The club joined the Football League the following year and has played at Anfield since its formation. Liverpool established itself as a major force in English and European football in the 1970s and 1980s.Liverpool F.C. was founded following a dispute between the Everton committee and John Houlding. The club has won 19 English premier league titles and 5 champions league titles. The club is now managed by Jurgen Klopp an experienced german coach with lots of charisma and passion for football. Jordan Henderson is the current captain of the club and one of their longest serving players.

MANAGEMENT OF LIVERPOOL

Jurgen Klopp is the manager of Liverpool. He works hand in hand with a lot of people for the success of the club. Some of the people he works with are the board members of the club, the medical team, the cleaners and other staff.The management of the club is not only in the hands of Klopp but all these staffs contribute to the success of the team. As a club, they need all their staffs to give their hundred percent effort because Liverpool is more than a club.

PLAYERS AND SUPPORTERS OF LIVERPOOL

Liverpool has one of the best squad in Europe with a deadly attacking force of 4 world class forwards namely 11 Mo Salah, 10 Sadio Mane,9 Roberto Firminho and 20 Diogo Jota.The midfield is marshalled by captain 14 Jordan Henderson and accompanied by the experience of 6 Thiago , 7 Milner ,3 Fabinho, 8 Naby Keita. 4 Van Dijk is the stopper in defence with 32 Matip being his regular partner. This team can boast of the best right and left backs in the world namely 26 Robertson and 66 Alexander Arnold. Allison mans the goal post.The fans are called the kopites. This club is nothing without the fans as they troop to the stadium both home and away matches keeping the team in high spirit no matter the situation.

TROPHIES OF LIVERPOOL

Liverpool is the most successful English club bosting of 64 major trophies being the Football League First Division (19 titles) ... European Cup (6 times) ... UEFA Cup (3 times) ... European Super Cup (4 times) ... Club World Cup (1 time) ... FA Cup (7 times) ... League Cup (8 times) ... Charity Shield/Community Shield (15 'wins')

TOURNAMENTS NUMBER OF AWARDS
Champions League 6
FA cup 7
Europe Cup 3
League Cup Cup 8
UEFA SuperCup 4
Fifa Club WorldCup 1
